Key.Original: Usage : #zeus <command> [params], available commands are :
Key.English: Usage : #zeus <command> [params], available commands are :

Key.Original: : get Zeus privileges (if whitelisted)
Key.English: : get Zeus privileges (if whitelisted)

Key.Original: : give up Zeus privileges
Key.English: : give up Zeus privileges

Key.Original: : display this documentation
Key.English: : display this documentation

Key.Original: <nickname> <SteamID> : whitelist <SteamID> under <nickname>
Key.English: <nickname> <SteamID> : whitelist <SteamID> under <nickname>

Key.Original: <nickname> : remove <nickname> from the whitelist
Key.English: <nickname> : remove <nickname> from the whitelist

Key.Original: : display the content of the current whitelist
Key.English: : display the content of the current whitelist

Key.Original: : merge the import helper value in the whitelist
Key.English: : merge the import helper value in the whitelist
Key.French: : intègre la valeur de l'assistant dans la liste d'autorisation

Key.Original: : dump whitelist content in the import helper
Key.English: : dump whitelist content in the import helper
Key.French: : copie le contenu de la liste dans l'assistant

Key.Original: You already have Zeus access.
Key.English: You already have Zeus access.
Key.French: Vous avez déjà accès à Zeus.

Key.Original: You are not allowed to access Zeus.
Key.English: You are not allowed to access Zeus.
Key.French: Vous n'êtes pas autorisé·e à accéder à Zeus.

Key.Original: You have been granted Zeus access.
Key.English: You have been granted Zeus access.
Key.French: Vous êtes autorisé·e à accéder à Zeus.

Key.Original: You had no access to Zeus.
Key.English: You had no access to Zeus.
Key.French: Vous n'aviez pas accès à Zeus.

Key.Original: You don't have access to Zeus anymore.
Key.English: You don't have access to Zeus anymore.
Key.French: Vous n'avez désormais plus accès à Zeus.

Key.Original: SteamID already whitelisted as %1.
Key.English: SteamID already whitelisted as %1.
Key.French: SteamID déjà autorisé en tant que %1.

Key.Original: Not a valid SteamID.
Key.English: Not a valid SteamID.

Key.Original: This SteamID is now whitelisted as %1.
Key.English: This SteamID is now whitelisted as %1.
Key.French: Ce SteamID est désormais autorisé en tant que %1.

Key.Original: SteamID associated to %1 has been revoked.
Key.English: SteamID associated to %1 has been revoked.
Key.French: SteamID associé à %1 révoqué avec succès.

Key.Original: No SteamID associated to %1 has been found.
Key.English: No SteamID associated to %1 has been found.

Key.Original: Whitelist is currently empty.
Key.English: Whitelist is currently empty.

Key.Original: Nickname : %1, SteamID : %2.
Key.English: Nickname : %1, SteamID : %2.

Key.Original: Whitelist exported to the helper field.
Key.English: Whitelist exported to the helper field.

Key.Original: Whitelist imported from the helper field, %1/%2 accepted entries.
Key.English: Whitelist imported from the helper field, %1/%2 accepted entries.
Key.French: Liste d'autorisation importée depuis l'assistant %1/%2 entrées acceptées.

Key.Original: Import/export helper
Key.English: Import/export helper

Key.Original: Use this in combination with import/export commands.
Key.English: Use this in combination with import/export commands.
Key.French: Utilisez ceci en combinaison des commandes d'import/export.

Key.Original: Replace original whitelist
Key.English: Replace original whitelist

Key.Original: When checked, the preexisting whitelist will be whiped out on import, right before adding the helper data. This will NOT remove existing Zeus accesses.
Key.English: When checked, the preexisting whitelist will be whiped out on import, right before adding the helper data. This will NOT remove existing Zeus accesses.
Key.French: Si cochée, la liste d'autorisation sera vidée au moment de l'import, juste avant l'ajout des données de l'assistant. Les accès à Zeus existants ne seront PAS supprimés.
